name: Boss of the Month
description:
Submission to Minijam 113 - Final Boss

Updated 22/08/2022 : Fixed an error preventing GameOver menu from showing up, y'all can lose all you want!

-----

You love money but your employees want raises, find the good words to decline.

Every one of your minion employee have request, type your response if their request is profitable, or pay the cost.

But paying too much will make you go bankrupt, how long will you survive?

-----

Every request has an indicator telling you if you should accept it or not (green = accept, red = deny), you have only one choice of word and if the words corresponds to the required action, you should type the word.

Words can be accepting (yes) or denying (die), if the word is the same type as the color indicator you must type it or you will lose money. If the word is the wrong type do not type it

Green thumb up = type the word only if it is accepting

Red thumb down = type the word only if it is denying

-----

CONTROLS : 

UI : Mouse

Game : Keyboard
